### About
<p>My name is Mirai Igarashi. I am a second year Master's student at Graduate School of Economics and Management, Tohoku University, in Sendai, Japan.</p>
<p>I belong to Marketing Research Lab. under the supervision of Prof. Nobuhiko Terui.</p> 
<p>I have been working on examining how word-of-mouth on the Web (such as Twitter, Amazon review, etc), communications between consumers, affect purchase behaviors of consumers.</p>
